title: Bug 121974: Can't evaluate global expressions when ResultIterator is not in the iteration loop
description: For global expressions, such as {params["p1"]},{new DateTime()}, it should always be available and evaluatable within the BIRT scripting environment. Currently, Dte scriptExpression has three types: BEFOREFIRSTROW, AFTERLASTROW, ONEACHROW.
OB: Global expressions like {params["p1"]},{new DateTime()} cannot be evaluated when ResultIterator is not in the iteration loop.
EB: It should return a correct result value whenever be evaluated within the BIRT scripting environment. Introduce a new GLOBAL expression type to mark this requirement.
SR:
1. Open a BIRT report with global expressions like {params["p1"]},{new DateTime()}.
2. Move the ResultIterator outside the iteration loop.
3. Attempt to evaluate the global expressions.
4. Observe that the expressions do not return the expected values.
